properties.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County
properties.headline: Rip Current Statement issued January 22 at 3:21AM EST until January 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Broward and Coastal Miami-Dade Counties.

* WHEN...From 1 PM EST this afternoon through Thursday evening.

* IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away
from shore into deeper water.
properties.instruction:
Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and
float. Don't swim against the current. If able, swim in a
direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the
shore and call or wave for help.

NWSheadline: HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING
